mapper.update: UPDATE salesreport SET customerName = #{customerName}, teaName = #{teaName}, color = #{color}, setCount = #{setCount}, saleCount = #{saleCount}, totalCount = #{totalCount}, price = #{price}, timedate = str_to_date(#{timedate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), totalPrice = #{totalPrice}, subtotal = #{subtotal}, remark = #{remark}, row_modifier = #{row_modifier,jdbcType=INTEGER}, row_modify_time = str_to_date(#{row_modify_time},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') WHERE id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
UPDATE salesreport SET row_state = 0, row_modifier = #{row_modifier,jdbcType=INTEGER}, row_modify_time = str_to_date(#{row_modify_time},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') WHERE id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select sr.id, sr.customerName, sr.teaName, sr.color, sr.setCount, sr.saleCount, sr.totalCount, sr.price, sr.totalPrice,sr.subtotal,sr.remark, date_format(sr.timedate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') timedate from salesreport sr where sr.row_state = 1
and sr.customerName like concat('%', #{customerName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and sr.timedate >= str_to_date(#{createTimeStart},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and sr.timedate <= str_to_date(#{createTimeEnd},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
order by sr.timedate desc
